attributes.action: rectrict the engine size for new drivers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like to make a petition to this subject because it because it has changed a familys life for the worst. And not just one familys life but lots of others. My cousin and his and our friend were involved in a car crash which resulted in the friend dying and my cousin in hospital. i want the law to be changed so that new drivers are restricted to up to a 1200cc petrol engine and up to a 1400cc deisel engine for 2 years of driving.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
